title: James.Cameron`s.Avatar.The.Game.Repack-R.G.Mechanics
description:
James.Cameron`s.Avatar.The.Game.Repack-R.G.Mechanics


Year: 2009
Genre: Action (Shooter) / 3D / 3st Person
Developer: Ubisoft Entertainment
Publisher: Ubisoft Entertainment
Published in Russia: Buka
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language:  | 
Voice Language:  | 
Crack: RELOADED

System requirements:

Operating system: Windows XP (32-Bit), Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
Processor: 3 Ghz Intel  Pentium  D 830 AMD Athlon  64 X2 3800 + or better
Memory: 2 GB
Video card: NVidia  6800 or ATI  X1650 or better 256 MB DirectX  10.0-compliant video card or DirectX  9.0c
Sound Card: Sound device compatible with DirectX  9.0
Free space on hard disk: 3.9 GB

Description:

The game will tell about the first contacts earthlings and the 
inhabitants of the beautiful blue planet Pandora. In the distant 
future earthlings have exhausted the resources of their native 
planet and is now seeking to acquire the gifts are not Earth, 
but the Pandora.

Peace-loving Na'vi, Pandora's Aborigines live, not knowing the 
technology, in harmony in the wonderful world of wildlife. What 
happens to the fragile peace sinekozhih giants Na'vi with long 
tails and huge green eyes, when a technological armada of Earth 
hangs in the sky of the planet? How to save humanity from resource 
starvation and, at the same time not destroy the biological 
civilization Aborigines? Which of the civilizations in the end will 
come first in the race for survival? Answers to these questions 
will allow players to get, standing on one side of the conflict 
and his own to build the future of their nation. Avatar is a 
prequel of the same movie, James Cameron's first project director 
for ten years, which will be released in theaters worldwide on December 14.

Features:

Play as we can for the people (a corporation), and for Na'Vi.
The game's storyline will be different from the history of film, 
although, of course, familiar characters will be encountered everywhere.
When fighting enemies, you'll get an experience that can be spent 
on improving skills.
James Cameron's Avatar: The Game - one of the few games that use 
the technology of space images, that is, for full immersion in the 
process you need to wear 3D-glasses, which will be completed with 
each box with the game.
The developers promise stunning special effects: fire, explosions, 
three-dimensional grass, whistling past you bullets, etc.

Features repack

James Cameron's Avatar: The Game
Game Version - v1.0.2
Automatic activation of game
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
